duties_responsibilities.duty: Work closely with the Tribe Lead to ensure alignment with the business, technology, and key partners.
Maintain close oversight of delivery and act as an escalation point for key partners.
Drive tribe-level communications to promote transparency and a collaborative culture across the tribe and squads.
Participate in managing a strategic portfolio consisting of small to large scale initiatives and programs within the Institutional Trade Processing Tribe.
Act as custodian of the tribe vision, mission, and structure, including documenting and monitoring for changes.
Partners with key collaborators to outline, monitor, and communicate business case measurements and outcomes as well as strategy alignment.
Facilitate tribe-level events and partnerships to ensure accuracy and quality of portfolio-level reporting.
Present information effectively and confidently to members of senior leadership team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree preferred or equivalent experience
